explanation: The stage direction 'Subtil tire un mouchoir blanc de sa poche, et est prêt de se moucher.' involves the character interacting with an object (a handkerchief). The verb 'tire' (pulls out) indicates the character is manipulating the object, which fits the definition of category 10 (object).
stgdir: Subtil tire un mouchoir blanc de sa poche, et est prêt de se moucher.
